name: Tropical Race
description:
Welcome to The TROPICAL RACE! Compete against others or try to get your name on the leaderboard. Grab your favorite outfit and head towards the top of the island. You can find the controls from the bottom left of the screen. If you prefer mounts, smaller ones, such as the roller skates or the skateboard, work the best. Use the scroll wheel of your mouse to adjust the camera distance. Double jump available.

HAPPY RACING ^^!

This game is made for Core Summer Games -Jam

Big thanks to CC-creators:

carmelgames: BANANA, Koawala
